Fields.Name: Turnip
Fields.Description: The first of many.

Fields.Name: Squirrel Tail
Fields.Description: This squirrel got a bit too close to those sassy gnomes.

Fields.Name: Clean Sponge
Fields.Description: Must keep the bridge clean!

Fields.Name: Swan Feather
Fields.Description: Looks like Prince Svan left in a hurry.

Fields.Name: Trousers
Fields.Description: One pair of princely trousers, slightly torn.

Fields.Name: Hamster Squire Clothes
Fields.Description: Now Prince Svan's squire is free, he won't need these.

Fields.Name: Hamster Squire Book
Fields.Description: Might contain some useful gossip about Prince Svan.

Fields.Name: Witches Wand
Fields.Description: Be careful about waving this around!

Fields.Name: Witches Toenail
Fields.Description: Be careful about waving this around!

Fields.Name: Kissy Frog's Tissue
Fields.Description: Disgusting! But it's good to clear up litter.

Fields.Name: Empty Potion Vials
Fields.Description: Probably not a good idea to kiss it again.

Fields.Name: Turnip Ends
Fields.Description: Not turnips for dinner again?

Fields.Name: Used Napkin
Fields.Description: Naughty Ivandoe for dropping this.

Fields.Name: Lock of Pig Hair
Fields.Description: Ah, the thiefstress left something behind.

Fields.Name: Buried Bone
Fields.Description: We must have found Cupcake's hidden food stash.

Fields.Name: Soggy Headband
Fields.Description: Let's hope we never have to drink this.

Fields.Name: Flint Tool
Fields.Description: Ivandoe can make something impressive with this.

Fields.Name: Raspberry Fairy Wand
Fields.Description: Wouldn't want it to get into the wrong hands.

Fields.Name: Bert's Spider Wizard Hat
Fields.Description: Perhaps we could save it for Halloween?

Fields.Name: Broken Wooden Prince
Fields.Description: A reminder of our daring escape from the troll.

Fields.Name: Duck Egg
Fields.Description: Turnip omelette, perhaps?

Fields.Name: Burnt Turnip
Fields.Description: Never again Bert! Never again.

Fields.Name: Twig of the Talking Tree
Fields.Description: The horrible gnomes knocked this off the tree.

Fields.Name: Paddling Stick
Fields.Description: For use on mysterious lakes.

Fields.Name: King Axolotl's Jewellery
Fields.Description: It's good enough for a King...

Fields.Name: Warrior's Helmet with Green Goo
Fields.Description: We can do better than this failed quester.

Fields.Name: Broken Bone
Fields.Description: Let's hope we don't end up like this too.

Fields.Name: The Royal Locket
Fields.Description: A priceless gift from Ivandoe’s mother, the Queen.

Fields.Name: The Sassy Gnomes
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Sassy Gnomes

Fields.Name: The Hissy Swan
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Hissy Swan

Fields.Name: The Kissy Frog
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Kissy Frog

Fields.Name: The Thiefstress
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Thiefstress

Fields.Name: The Pretty Poodle
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Pretty Poodle

Fields.Name: The Raspberry Fairy
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Raspberry Fairy

Fields.Name: The Plucky Duck
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Plucky Duck

Fields.Name: The Talking Tree
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Talking Tree

Fields.Name: The Prom Date
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Prom-Date

Fields.Name: The Moany Mountain
Fields.Description: The Prince and the Moany Mountain

Fields.Name: The Glade
Fields.Description: Ivandoe's training campsite.

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: The forest holds many dangers, so the prince takes every opportunity to hone his formidable fighting skills.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Untroubled by the gnomes’ shenanigans, the mighty Ivandoe returns to camp.

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: The trail leads to a peaceful glade, a fitting stage on which to perfect the prince's mighty roar!

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: The petulant swan dispatched, Ivandoe returns to the peaceful glade.

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Happening upon a tranquil lily pond, prince Ivandoe relaxes by demonstrating some thrilling swordplay.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Though wary of the amorous little frogman, the plucky prince returns once more to the lily pond.

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: The trail leads to a peaceful glade, a fitting stage on which to perfect the prince's mighty roar!

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Prince Ivandoe had been taught that practice makes perfect, so practice he shall!

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Fearsome growls resonate from the forest, but Ivandoe laughs in the face and er…ears (?) of danger.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Ivandoe returns to the dark woods, guided by the gamey scent of french poodle

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Despite Ivandoe’s unrivalled tracking skills, he fails to notice the large footprints surrounding his camp.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Unperturbed by bonkers trolls or scary bears, Ivandoe leads bert back to their woodland camp.

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: A loud rumble echoes through the forest… the royal belly is empty and Ivandoe’s thoughts turn to turnips.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Prince Ivandoe returns with a firm resolve. For his is an important quest and he cannot afford to get egg on his face.

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Distracted by the sweet scent of acorns, our valiant hero stumbles upon a mystical forest.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Neither squirrels nor gnomes can distract Ivandoe from his unwavering quest for acorns…I mean the golden feather!

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Prince Ivandoe must cross the lake of mystery, taking great care, for the royal fur poufs up terribly when splashed.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Crossing the lake of mystery requires balance and patience. neither of which the spirited prince is known for!

Fields.Title: Unvisited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Finally prince Ivandoe reaches the last leg of his epic journey to eagle mountain.

Fields.Title: Visited
Fields.Dialogue Text: Ivandoe is built of princely stuff and with a brisk slap of the royal thigh, he returns to complete his heroic quest

Fields.Title: Intro
Fields.Dialogue Text: Welcome to prince ivandoe’s quest for the golden feather. And behold the royal map that charteth his heroic journey.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Psst... Choose a location to be on your way.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Click on the screen to walk around the level.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Welcome one and all. Though I be but a lowly bard from the Royal Stag Court, and cannot presume to ever do it justice...

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: ...it is my great honour to tell the tale of the mighty Prince Ivandoe and his heroic quest for the golden feather.

Fields.Title: Tutorial Move
Fields.Description: Bert teaches you how to move.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Click on the items around the level to collect them.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Click on this icon to check all the items you have found in the game.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Click on this icon to check the map and continue with your journey.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Click on this icon to check your quest log.

Fields.Title: Intro
Fields.Dialogue Text: Clicketh play to enter the realm of… Ivandoe!

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Welcome one and all. Though I be but a lowly bard from the Royal Stag Court, and cannot presume to ever do it justice...

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: ...it is my great honour to tell the tale of the mighty Prince Ivandoe and his heroic quest for the golden feather.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Good choice!

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Beware!

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Bravo!

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Ah… well, it looks like our quest for the Golden Feather is still to be continued. You have gone as far as you can, for now. But you have shown much pluck, brave quester!

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Achievement released

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Achievement gained

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: A monumental achievement

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: A thrilling achievement

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: The Quest is saved

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Fine questing

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: Your certificate has been added to your inventory.

Fields.Title: New Dialogue
Fields.Dialogue Text: In recognition of your many achievements, you have been given a great honour: a Knighthood of the Royal Stag Court! Bravo!
